about_the_game: theHunter: Duck Hunter DLC includes 3 months premium membership including full licenses to hunt All animals, access to All reserves, unlimited basic ammo and all the gear you need to hunt Mallard ducks in theHunter. Items included: 20 GA Semi-Automatic Shotgun, Summer Swamp Camo Jacket, Summer Swamp Camo Pants, Summer Swamp Camo Hat, Summer Swamp Camo Gloves, Summer Swamp Camo Boots, Waterfowl blind, Mallard Short Range Caller, Mallard Short Range Caller, 3 Mallard Male Decoy, 3 Mallard Female Decoy and a Spinning Wings Male American Black Duck Decoy.
detailed_description: theHunter: Duck Hunter DLC includes 3 months premium membership including full licenses to hunt All animals, access to All reserves, unlimited basic ammo and all the gear you need to hunt Mallard ducks in theHunter. Items included: 20 GA Semi-Automatic Shotgun, Summer Swamp Camo Jacket, Summer Swamp Camo Pants, Summer Swamp Camo Hat, Summer Swamp Camo Gloves, Summer Swamp Camo Boots, Waterfowl blind, Mallard Short Range Caller, Mallard Short Range Caller, 3 Mallard Male Decoy, 3 Mallard Female Decoy and a Spinning Wings Male American Black Duck Decoy.
name: theHunter - Duck Hunter

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows ® 10/8/7/
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz or AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800, ATI/AMD Radeon HD 2400 (NVidia GeForce 8800, ATI/AMD Radeon HD 2400)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
